items.title: Saree
items.prompt:
Create a retro, vintage-inspired image with a grainy yet luminous finish. The girl is draped in a flawless plain purple saree, paired with a black sleeveless blouse, styled in a Pinterest-aesthetic, old-school elegance. The vibe captures the essence of a 90s movie “baddie” — dark brown, silky hair flowing naturally, with a small flower tucked visibly into her hair, enhanced by a soft, romantic breeze.

She stands against an aged wooden door, where deep shadows and dramatic contrasts heighten the mystery and artistic mood, creating an enchanting, cinematic atmosphere. The lighting feels warm and nostalgic, subtly dramatic yet inviting. Her pose is candid and graceful, caught mid-motion as she adjusts her saree, adding a sense of realism, confidence, and timeless charm.

items.title: Saree
items.prompt: A minimalist, Pinterest-aesthetic retro look featuring a plain red chiffon saree. The mood channels a 90s movie romance, with dark brown wavy-curly hair and a small flower tucked visibly into her curls, gently romanticizing a breezy, wind-kissed atmosphere. She stands against a solid, slightly textured wall, where deep shadows and high contrast create a sense of drama and mystery. Warm, golden lighting—reminiscent of sunset or golden hour—bathes the scene. Her expression is moody yet serene, quietly happy, and introspective.

items.title: Snow
items.prompt: Show a person sitting on a simple bench in a minimal winter-themed studio environment with soft snow falling around them. The person sits with legs wide apart, leaning slightly forward, hands together in front, creating a cool, confident, high-fashion editorial pose. The person must be wearing an oversized cream-colored fur coat with a large hood wrapped tightly around the face, covering most of the head and neck. Underneath, they should wear wide-leg winter pants, chunky white winter sneakers, white gloves, and dark futuristic sunglasses. Add a soft grey beanie under the hood, visible just slightly. Keep the ground snowy with scattered snow around their feet and lightly covering parts of the coat. Place a metal water bottle on the bench beside them, matching the reference object placement. The background should blend the studio with a natural outdoor view — visible through a wide, soft opening — showing snow-capped pine trees and distant mountains, adding a cinematic winter feel. Lighting should be bright, clean, and diffused with soft shadows. Capture crisp, ultra-realistic details in the fur texture, falling snowflakes, clothing fabric, and reflective sunglasses. Overall mood: luxury winter editorial, calm, confident, and visually striking

items.title: Stranger things
items.prompt:
Conversation with Gemini
Genera un retrato dramático inspirado en un poster de Stranger Things 4. Inserta el rostro de la persona de mi foto en el centro del encuadre con una expresión seria, intensa y emocional, mirando directamente al frente. Utiliza una iluminación cinematográfica con tonos rojizos, morados y oscuros que envuelven al personaje, creando un ambiente misterioso y sobrenatural. Añade un fondo compuesto por nubes densas, efectos de humo, destellos brillantes y partículas ardientes flotando alrededor del personaje, fusionándose con la escena para un acabado épico y apocalíptico. Agrega la silueta de una casa oscura sobre una colina. Incluye el número ‘4’ en rojo junto al logo de Stranger Things. Mantén estilo ochentero, textura cinematográfica, gradiente intenso, e integra el rostro de forma natural.

items.title: Green
items.prompt: A contemporary fashion editorial photo of a male model in a pastel lavender oversized sweatshirt with matching joggers, paired with chunky white sneakers. A soft mint-green studio backdrop with dreamy cinematic lighting emphasizes color harmony and smooth textures. The model reclines casually on a modern chair, one leg draped over the armrest, projecting effortless confidence.

items.title: Red
items.prompt: A striking fashion editorial photo of a male model dressed in a bold red satin bomber jacket paired with relaxed-fit black trousers and sleek black sneakers. Background: a dramatic purple-toned studio backdrop with cinematic rim lighting that accentuates glossy satin textures and contrasts. The model crouches low with one arm resting on his knee, head tilted slightly, exuding intensity.

items.title: portrait
items.prompt: A refined fashion editorial photo of a male model wearing a tailored cream blazer layered over a soft grey turtleneck, slim-fit cream trousers, and brown loafers. A minimalist light beige studio backdrop with soft golden cinematic lighting creates a futuristic yet timeless editorial atmosphere. The model leans slightly against a wall, arms crossed, calm and composed.

items.title: Red
items.prompt: A stylish fashion editorial photo of a male model wearing an oversized white sweatshirt and matching white sweatpants, paired with clean white sneakers. Set against a soft red studio backdrop with diffused cinematic lighting that enhances fabric textures. Futuristic editorial style. The model is sitting elegantly, head slightly tilted, posture relaxed yet stylish.

items.title: Outdoor
items.prompt: A highly realistic photograph of the person exactly as shown in the reference image, positioned at the center of the frame. The face, facial structure, skin texture, and identity remain completely unchanged. The subject stands outdoors in soft daylight, wearing simple everyday clothing. Natural posture, relaxed expression. Shot at eye level, even lighting, shallow depth of field, realistic colors, no stylization, looks like a DSLR photo.

items.title: Suit
items.prompt: A focused portrait of the person exactly as in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face remains completely unchanged. The subject is placed against a dark, minimal background with soft frontal lighting emphasizing facial details. Expression is composed and serious. Shot at eye level, shallow depth of field, high clarity, clean professional portrait with no stylization.

items.title: Outdoor
items.prompt: A natural outdoor portrait of the person exactly as shown in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face and identity remain unchanged. The subject stands in open shade with soft, diffused daylight. Expression is calm and natural. Background is lightly blurred with subtle environmental hints. Shot at eye level, shallow depth of field, realistic colors, relaxed lifestyle portrait feel.

items.title: Side
items.prompt: A realistic portrait of the person exactly as in the reference image, positioned at the center of the frame. The face remains unchanged. The subject’s body is angled slightly to the side while the face remains clearly visible, adding depth and dimension. Soft directional lighting highlights facial contours. Shallow depth of field, natural skin texture, clean background, polished portrait photography style

items.title: Studio
items.prompt: A clean studio-style portrait of the person exactly as shown in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face and identity remain unchanged. The subject stands against a soft grey background with controlled studio lighting that evenly illuminates the face. Neutral expression, relaxed posture. Shot at eye level, sharp focus on the face, subtle background blur, modern professional portrait aesthetic.

items.title: Women
items.prompt: A realistic portrait of the person exactly as in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face remains unchanged. The subject is positioned near a window, softly lit by natural daylight from one side. Expression is relaxed and approachable, head slightly angled. Background is softly blurred and minimal. Shot at eye level, shallow depth of field, natural colors, clean and authentic portrait look.

items.title: Standing
items.prompt: Ultra realistic, hyper-detailed 8K portrait of a person standing indoors in a modern home interior, leaning casually against a blue table with both hands. He has short, neatly styled black hair, Face with the face from the uploaded image, keeping the facial features exactly the same. He is wearing a light mint green linen shirt, slightly transparent with natural fabric texture, sleeves rolled up casually, paired with crisp white pants. Natural daylight softly illuminates his face, highlighting skin texture and fine details. In the background, elegant interior décor is visible white lilies arranged in a tall yellow glass vase, additional green glass vases on a shelf, patterned wall design, and a mirror reflecting part of the room. The entire scene has a clean, fresh, modern, and luxurious lifestyle aesthetic with cinematic lighting and photorealistic details.i want same face as i uploaded no alternation 100% same. aspect ratio 4:5.

items.title: Tower
items.prompt:
Ultra-realistic 8K cinematic full-body portrait of a stylis young man leaning casually against a railing in front of the Eiffel Tower in Paris. His exact face and perfectly styled hairstyle match the uploaded reference image, with beard cut identical to the reference. His face is
directly toward the camera, with a confident, relaxed expression. He wears fitted light blue denim jeans, a crisp white t-shirt, and a denim jacket draped casually over one shoulder. Black sneakers and sleek sunglasses complete his modern street-style look. His body is slightly leaned against the railing, with one hand in his pocket and the other lightly holding the jacket, creating a stylish, effortless pose. The Eiffel Tower rises tall in the background beneath a dramatic cloudy sky. Captured from a low-angle perspective to enhance height and presence, with cinematic fashion editorial lighting, ultra-chann etails and luxury lifestyle aestheties."

items.title: walking
items.prompt: A realistic cinematic medium shot of the person exactly as shown in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face remains unchanged. The subject is walking forward through a quiet city street at night, mid-step, wearing a modern casual outfit with layered textures. Hands relaxed, natural motion in the body. Shot at eye level with subtle background blur. Cinematic lighting with soft streetlight highlights, shallow depth of field, subtle film grain, moody urban color grading, high-end cinematic still.

items.title: Coastal Power
items.prompt: A highly realistic cinematic wide shot of the person exactly as in the reference image, positioned perfectly at the center of the frame. The face, facial structure, and identity remain completely unchanged. The subject stands on a rugged coastal cliff as waves crash below, wearing a fitted dark jacket and neutral-toned trousers. The posture is strong and grounded, shoulders squared, arms relaxed by the sides. Shot from a slightly low angle to enhance presence. Natural dramatic lighting, shallow depth of field with environmental separation, cinematic contrast, film-style color grading, professional movie still quality.

items.title: Power
items.prompt: A highly realistic cinematic shot of the person exactly as in the reference image, positioned perfectly at the center of the frame. The face and identity remain unchanged. The subject is wearing a sharply tailored dark suit with a crisp shirt, cinematic and elegant in style. The posture is upright and confident, hands relaxed by the sides. Dramatic cinematic lighting creates strong contrast and soft shadows. Shallow depth of field, film grain, moody color grading, professional cinema camera look.

items.title: Cinematic
items.prompt: A highly realistic cinematic shot of the person exactly as in the reference image, positioned perfectly at the center of the frame. The subject is standing alone on a rain-soaked urban street at night, surrounded by soft neon reflections from distant streetlights and storefronts. The face, hairstyle, body, and outfit remain completely unchanged from the reference image. The lighting is dramatic and cinematic, with subtle rim light outlining the subject and soft shadows shaping the face. Shallow depth of field, background softly blurred, cinematic color grading with cool blues and warm highlights. Shot on a professional cinema camera, natural skin texture, film-like contrast, moody atmosphere.

items.title: Cinematic
items.prompt: A stylish man with dark, wavy hair and a beard, wearing sunglasses, a black silk shirt unbuttoned, and light-colored trousers. He is reclining comfortably on a luxurious yacht deck at sunset. The background features a serene ocean with a vibrant orange and pink sunset on the horizon, and faint landmasses in the distance. The man has a relaxed yet confident pose, with one hand resting on his knee and the other on his chest. A dark wallet or small clutch is placed on the wooden deck beside him. The lighting is soft and warm, highlighting the mak and the sunset. And don't change the face

items.title: Selfie
items.prompt:
Gen-Z guy mirror selfie, 9:16 oversized gray knit shirt over black tee, distressed denim, tousled curls, silver ring + chain, iPhone close to face. Minimal modern washroom, soft diffused light, cinematic editorial vibe.

Shot on 35mm, shallow depth, photoreal 8K.

items.title: Dhurandhar
items.prompt: Ultra realistic, cinematic full-body portrait of the same young man from the reference photo (same hairstyle, sharp eyebrows, trimmed beard, and confident facial expression). A powerful cinematic scene showing a stylish villain making an intense entrance. A sharp-featured man wearing a black kurta, black overcoat, and dark sunglasses walks forward with a confident attitude. Warm golden sunlight filters through patterned fabric shades hanging overhead, creating dramatic light and shadow on his face. Behind him, two men follow - one elderly with a long white beard, black turban, layered grey robe, and heavy jewelry. The other younger man with a beard and dark glasses, dressed in dark traditional clothing. The environment looks like an ancient masketplace or desert fort made of sandstone, with textured walls and warm golden tones. The camera angle is slighly low, capturing a heoic, slow-motion walk. Highly detailed faces, crisp shadows, cinematic depth of field, rich colour grading, dramatic.
